caption.p: Hematoxylin–eosin staining of longitudinal sections of trout fillets. ( A) uncoated fillet (UTF) after 12 day period of storage and ( B) carrageenan coated fillet (CTF) after 12 days of storage; CTF and ACTF gave similar results. Scale bars: A,B: 10 μm. Sections are representative of three trout analyzed for each experimental group.
